title: Chocolate cake (Schokogugelhupf)
description: You’ll need a gugelhupf or ring-shaped cake tin for this Viennese cake, which is served with afternoon coffee in the wonderful cafés of that city. We made it by the side of a mountain road on the Grossglockner, the highest peak in Austria, where it tasted even more amazing.
ingredients: 50g/2oz ground almonds, plus 1 tbsp for dusting
